summary: The story about the life of the students at a university in Hangchow. Chu Ying-Tai is a female who has to be disguised as a man in order to gain entry into the school.
cast: Betty Loh Ti|Ivy Ling Po|Li-Chu Chang|Yanyan Chen|Kuang-Chao Chiang|Chuang Chiao|Han Chin|Miao Ching|Mu Chu|Chiang Fung|Julia Hsia|King Hu|Man Huang|Chieh Jen|Ting Jing|Pao-Shu Kao|Carrie Ku Mei|Feng Ku|Shan Kwan|Hsiang Chun Li|Kun Li|Ting Li|Mar Lo|Chou Mo|Sha-Fei Ouyang|Yen Shih|Dan Tang|Grace Ning Ting|Chung Wang|Hsiu Wen|Chih-Ching Yang|Jackie Chan
title: Liang Shan Bo yu Zhu Ying Tai
